page.title: 13SATURDAY (CLOWNE)
page.content: MY NAME IS ELLEN BUTTERWORTH AND I AM 14 YEARS OLD.I LIVE ON CRESWELL ROAD IN CLOWNE WITH MY PARENTS AND ELDER BROTHER.I AM GOING TO OUTLINE A TYPICAL SATURDAY IN MY LIFE. I GET UP ABOUT 10a.m. AND HELP MY MOTHER WITH JOBS LIKE SHOPPING OR BAKING.THEN I TIDY MY ROOM AND SET THE TABLE FOR LUNCH.A TYPICAL LUNCH IS PORK CHOPS FOLLOWED BY TAPIOCA. AFTER LUNCH I USUALLY MEET MY FRIEND SHELLEY,SOMETIMES WE PLAY TENNIS OR TAKE OUR DOG FOR A WALK.OR WE MIGHT LISTEN TO RECORDS OR PLAY SNOOKER. MOST WEEKENDS SHELLEY STAYS AT MY HOUSE.AFTER TEA WE GET READY TO GO THE DISCO AT THE CHURCH HALL.WHEN THIS FINISHES AT 10p.m.WE WALK HOME CALLING AT THE FISH AND CHIP SHOP FOR CHIPS AND PEAS WHICH COSTS 30 PENCE.
